title: "GSA to use more bots in 2020, also emphasize AI expertise in fellowship program"
excerpt: "The agency wants to expand its use of robotic process automation (RPA), while also increasing the Presidential Innovation Fellows (PIF) program’s emphasis on artificial intelligence (AI). The GSA already has 33 RPA bots in operation, and that number will grow this year, officials said. “The program has a robust pipeline of new use cases ..."
